mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_NUM, M.MENU_NAME, CASE WHEN M.MENU_NUM = 68 THEN 'board' ELSE M2.ADRS END AS ADRS, CASE WHEN M.MENU_NUM = 68 THEN 1 ELSE M.ADD_PRMTR END AS ADD_PRMTR FROM MENU M INNER JOIN MENU M2 ON M.ADD_PRMTR = M2.MENU_NUM WHERE M.MENU_NAME = '고객지원'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INDVDL_CLNT(CLNT_NUM, ID, PW, CLNT_NAME, PHONE_NUM_1, ADRS, DTL_ADRS) VALUES (INDVDL_CLNT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{signup_id}, #{signup_pw}, #{signup_name}, #{phone_num1}, #{adrs}, #{dtlAdrs})
mapper.update: UPDATE INDVDL_CLNT SET PW = #{pw} WHERE CLNT_NUM = #{clnt_num}
